level.heading: AUTHORITY TO ISSUE REQUIRED PERMITS (ยง 24-302)

level.text: The Director of the Department of Regulatory and Consumer Affairs is authorized to issue a Sidewalk Cafe Permit and a Certificate of Use pursuant to the requirements of this chapter.
A Sidewalk Cafe Permit shall be issued when the following conditions are satisfied:
An application to occupy public space has been received by the Director of Regulatory and Consumer Affairs;
The application has been reviewed and approved pursuant to this chapter;
All applicable fees have been paid; and
All insurance requirements have been approved and fulfilled.
A Certificate of Use for a sidewalk cafe shall be issued when the following conditions are satisfied:
A Sidewalk Cafe Permit has been issued;
Where applicable, a Building Permit has been issued;
The sidewalk cafe has been inspected and approved pursuant to ยง306 of this chapter; and
All applicable fees have been paid.
